bridge.toolkit.util
Class DMParser

java.lang.Object
  bridge.toolkit.util.XMLParser
      bridge.toolkit.util.DMParser

public class DMParser
extends XMLParser

Provides a way to find the any referenced data model codes referenced in a file.

searchForDmRefs

public java.util.List<java.lang.String> searchForDmRefs(org.jdom.Document dmDoc)
Searches any document for dmCode elements and returns the attributes in the data module code format.

Parameters:
dmDoc - - Document JDOM Document object that represents the DOM of the XML file being searched.
Returns:
List A List of data module code Strings that are found.
